name: TAX_INFO
description: This table contains information about the tax rate definitions applicable to the sales of goods and services within a business transaction.

columns.name: TAX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the tax definition record.

columns.name: TAX_ID_TAX_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the tax definition's record name.

columns.name: TAX_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the tax definition's record name.
